author: Katerina Ang
title: Companies Use AI to Help Managers Become More Human
text:
When the social-media agency Social.Lab got its U.S. operations off the ground in 2015, it had a staff of three. Since then, it has ballooned to 70—putting a lot more pressure on its managers.
So the company is turning to artificial intelligence for help.
Their tool: Butterfly, a management platform that’s embedded into the workplace messaging... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
